argument.description: The input value used to create the Unicode string. It can be a char, varchar2, nchar, nvarchar2, clob, or nclob.

returnType: The COMPOSE function returns a Unicode string. Below is a listing of unistring values that can be combined with other characters in the compose function.
description: The Oracle/PLSQL COMPOSE function returns a Unicode string.
sample:
COMPOSE('o' || unistr('\0308') )
Result: ö

COMPOSE('a' || unistr('\0302') )
Result: â

COMPOSE('e' || unistr('\0301') )
Result: é
